Project Functional Requirement: Data preparation for Bank of Thailand reporting
Functional Requirement Details:
Typology for reporting to Bank of Thailand
Trade Channel for reporting to Bank of Thailand
B2B / Fully Hedged for Product Mandate condition checking
The systrem should provide all FO booking screen

The system should provide real time consolidated views for PnL, cashflows and risks.
The system should provide real time view with breakdown per instrument/portfolio/Trader
P&L calculation and view by product type

The system should provide a daily blotter functionality.
Deals captured in the monitored books should be shown immediately and on real time basis in the blotter

System should support specific FO validation based on definable checks.
Ability to perform 4 eyes validations
A queue should be available to monitor the status of the lifecycle of the deal and perform corresponding events
Senior Front Office Officer validate the exceptional cases on system instead of E-mail
FO users should be able to see the analytical CVA at time of booking
It should be possible to identify those deals.
The system should perform check on backdate deals and block them

Ability to book packaged deals (i.e. external deals into sales portfolio with risk transfer into trader ptf)
Ability Book sales margin into sales book. Sales margin position can then be selldown into trader book
Ability to book back to back or full hedge fx deals
Ability to split cross currency fx deals into USD components

Ability to book (Inter-portfolio and External deal), price, mark-to-the-market, and calculate P/L and book value of both fixed-coupon and floating coupon bond investment in accordance with normal market practice, TMB practice, and related standard and regulation. Ability to book inflation linked bonds

Ability to support partial buyback and early redemption before maturity.

Ability to book fixed or float depo/loan
Ability to correctly record transactions done with counterparties from the Bank?s portfolios, calculate interest and generate cash flows based on basis of calculation and day-count convention
All functions applied for long-term borrowing must be usable

The system should provide ability to perform an early redemption partially or fully for any transaction

System should be able to display in the simulation view the clean price, accrual interest and dirty price
To be able to support Bond issuance in Fixed income module

The system should be able to support following interest calculation type :
- discount interest (only one time up front), interest bearing (interest at maturity) ,  fixed/float interest , Step up , quarterly , semi-annually , annually , odd first and last coupon , irregular interest and payment schedules(fixed to float , float to fixed , fixed interest and pay upfront at the beginning of each interest period or anniversary of issue date except first interest payment pay 7 days after issue date).

Following day count conventions should be supported:
Actual/365 , Actual/360 , Actual/actual , 30/360 , 30/360 plus actual/365 for last payment.

Following Business day conventions (in case payment fall on public holidays) should be supported:
 - Following business day convention
(if the payment date falls on non-business day, it shall be postponed to the next business day without extending the interest period. In case of maturity date, the payment date will be postponed to the next business day reflecting the extension of interest period.  
- Modified following business day convention (if the payment date falls on non-business day, it shall be postponed to the next business day with extending the interest period. if the payment date falls in the next calendar month, it rolls backward to the immediately preceding target business day with adjustment of interest period.)
